block.p: APT-Tami. We are very sad to say that the indomitable Tami, wife of dearly departed Gus, beloved mother of Charles and Ursula Apt, Lee Apt, and Jane Apt Bevans, aunt of Florrie Milan Beldock, Brett Beldock, Gregg Beldock, loving grandmother of Gregory, Sam, Jane, Jeffrey, Jill, Loren and Maggie, greatgrandmother of Sophia, Luke, Gus, Danny, Calvin, Malcolm, Douglas, Gregory and Jack, died on August 28, 2000. A memorial service will be held in late September or early October in New York.

APT-Tami. We are very sad to say that the indomitable Tami, wife of dearly departed Gus, beloved mother of Charles and Ursula Apt, Lee Apt, and Jane Apt Bevans, aunt of Florrie Milan Beldock, Brett Beldock, Gregg Beldock, loving grandmother of Gregory, Sam, Jane, Jeffrey, Jill, Loren and Maggie, greatgrandmother of Sophia, Luke, Gus, Danny, Calvin, Malcolm, Douglas, Gregory and Jack, died on August 28, 2000. A memorial service will be held in late September or early October in New York.
